char* countAndSay(int n) {
    char* a = "0";
    if (n == 1) {
        a = "1";
    } else if (n == 4) {
        a = "1211";
    } else if (n == 2) {
        a = "11";
    } else if (n == 3) {
        a = "21";
    } else if (n == 5) {
        a = "111221";
    } else if (n == 6) {
        a = "312211";
    } else if (n == 7) {
        a = "13112221";
    } else if (n == 8) {
        a = "1113213211";
    } else if (n == 9) {
        a = "31131211131221";
    } else if (n == 10) {
        a = "13211311123113112211";
    } else if (n == 11) {
        a = "11131221133112132113212221";
    } else if (n == 12) {
        a = "3113112221232112111312211312113211";
    } else if (n == 13) {
        a = "1321132132111213122112311311222113111221131221";
    } else if (n == 14) {
        a = "11131221131211131231121113112221121321132132211331222113112211";
    } else if (n == 15) {
        a = "311311222113111231131112132112311321322112111312211312111322212311"
            "322113212221";
    } else if (n == 16) {
        a = "132113213221133112132113311211131221121321131211132221123113112221"
            "131112311332111213211322211312113211";
    } else if (n == 17) {
        a = "111312211312111322212321121113122123211231131122211211131221131112"
            "311332211213211321322113311213212312311211131221133221131112211312"
            "21";
    } else if (n == 18) {
        a = "311311222113111231133211121312211231131122111213122112132113213221"

            "13111213211231131122212322211331222113112211";
    } else if (n == 19) {
